title: Track Awesome Webaudio Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome Webaudio (notthetup/awesome-webaudio) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of awesome WebAudio packages and resources.

items.title: Awesome Webaudio Updates on Jun 17, 2025
items.content_text:
### Packages / Libraries

*   [dsssp (⭐28)](https://github.com/NumberOneBot/dsssp) - React component library for visualizing and managing audio filters with drag-n-drop and transitions support.

### Packages / Apps

*   [dsssp-demo (⭐5)](https://github.com/NumberOneBot/dsssp-demo) - WebAudio music player with 7-bands EQ and filter presets.
items.content_html:
Packages / Libraries

  • dsssp (⭐28) - React component library for visualizing and managing audio filters with drag-n-drop and transitions support.

Packages / Apps

  • dsssp-demo (⭐5) - WebAudio music player with 7-bands EQ and filter presets.

items.title: Awesome Webaudio Updates on Aug 19, 2024
items.content_text:
### Resources / Tutorials

*   [audio-katas (⭐59)](https://github.com/survivejs/audio-katas) - A collection of self-guided katas during which you will build a DAW of your own while getting exposed to the key Web Audio APIs.
items.content_html:
Resources / Tutorials

  • audio-katas (⭐59) - A collection of self-guided katas during which you will build a DAW of your own while getting exposed to the key Web Audio APIs.

items.title: Awesome Webaudio Updates on Jun 30, 2024
items.content_text:
### Packages / Apps

*   [Binary Synth (⭐74)](https://github.com/MaxAlyokhin/binary-synth) - A web-synthesizer that generates sound from the binary code of any files.
items.content_html:
Packages / Apps

  • Binary Synth (⭐74) - A web-synthesizer that generates sound from the binary code of any files.

items.title: Awesome Webaudio Updates on Feb 07, 2024
items.content_text:
### Packages / Libraries

*   [waveform-path (⭐114)](https://github.com/jerosoler/waveform-path) - Library to generate waveforms paths in svg.
*   [wave-audio-path-player (⭐60)](https://github.com/jerosoler/wave-audio-path-player) - Simple audio player webcomponent customizable with waveform.
items.content_html:

  • waveform-path (⭐114) - Library to generate waveforms paths in svg.
  • wave-audio-path-player (⭐60) - Simple audio player webcomponent customizable with waveform.

items.content_text:

*   [MusicXML Player (⭐55)](https://github.com/infojunkie/musicxml-player) - A TypeScript component that loads and plays MusicXML files in the browser using Web Audio and Web MIDI.
items.content_html:

items.content_text:

items.title: Awesome Webaudio Updates on Jun 22, 2020
items.content_text:
### Packages / Libraries

*   [@magenta/music (⭐2.1k)](https://github.com/magenta/magenta-js/tree/master/music) - A JavaScript library to use machine learning models and generate music in the browser, by having some neat abstractions over the Webaudio API.
items.content_html:
Packages / Libraries

  • @magenta/music (⭐2.1k) - A JavaScript library to use machine learning models and generate music in the browser, by having some neat abstractions over the Webaudio API.

items.title: Awesome Webaudio Updates on Jun 17, 2020
items.content_text:
### Packages / Libraries

*   [XSound.js](https://xsound.app/) - Full stack library.
*   [p5.sound](https://p5js.org/reference/#/libraries/p5.sound) - An extension that adds Web Audio functionality to the creative coding library [p5.js](https://p5js.org/).

### Packages / Apps

*   [X Sound](https://xsound.app/) - Multi Sound Application that uses XSound.js.

### Resources / Books

*   [JavaScript for Sound Artists](https://www.routledge.com/JavaScript-for-Sound-Artists-Learn-to-Code-with-the-Web-Audio-API/Turner-Leonard/p/book/9781138961531) - A bottom up JavaScript / DOM course using Web Audio for all the examples.
items.content_html:
Packages / Libraries

  • XSound.js - Full stack library.
  • p5.sound - An extension that adds Web Audio functionality to the creative coding library p5.js.

Packages / Apps

  • X Sound - Multi Sound Application that uses XSound.js.

Resources / Books

  • JavaScript for Sound Artists - A bottom up JavaScript / DOM course using Web Audio for all the examples.

items.title: Awesome Webaudio Updates on Jun 03, 2020
items.content_text:
### Packages / Apps

*   [AudioMass](https://audiomass.co/) - free, open source, web-based Audio and Waveform Editor.
*   [Csound IDE](https://ide.csound.com/) - web IDE for [CSound programming language](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Csound).

### Obsolete / Community

*   [Web Audio Modules](https://www.webaudiomodules.org/) - synthesizers and audio effects processors for web browsers (both API and implementations).
items.content_html:
Packages / Apps

  • AudioMass - free, open source, web-based Audio and Waveform Editor.
  • Csound IDE - web IDE for CSound programming language.

Obsolete / Community

  • Web Audio Modules - synthesizers and audio effects processors for web browsers (both API and implementations).

items.title: Awesome Webaudio Updates on Dec 07, 2019
items.content_text:
### Packages / Frameworks

*   [Bap (⭐116)](https://github.com/adamrenklint/bap) - A toolkit for making beats and composing sequences, inspired by the classic MPC60/2000.

### Packages / Libraries

*   [Sound.js (⭐313)](https://github.com/kittykatattack/sound.js) - A micro-library to load, play and generate sound effects and music for games and interactive applications.
*   [Circular Audio Wave (⭐270)](https://github.com/kelvinau/circular-audio-wave) - A JS library for audio visualization in circular wave using Web Audio API and ECharts.
*   [Wad (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/rserota/wad) - Web Audio DAW. Use the Web Audio API for dynamic sound synthesis. It's like jQuery for your ears.

### Resources / Tutorials

*   [WebAudio School (⭐415)](https://github.com/mmckegg/web-audio-school) - A series of self-guided workshops to learn WebAudio.

### Obsolete / Community

*   [Gibberish (⭐394)](https://github.com/gibber-cc/gibberish) - A JavaScript DSP library that creates JIT optimized audio callbacks using code generation techniques.
*   [lissajous (⭐406)](https://github.com/kylestetz/lissajous) - A tool for programmatic audio performance.
*   [SSSynthesiser.js (⭐50)](https://github.com/surikov/SSSynthesiser.js) - A wavetable synthesizer for interactive music and sound effects.
*   [WAAX (⭐303)](https://github.com/hoch/WAAX/) - Build Music Apps for browsers.
*   [Band.js (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/meenie/band.js/) An interface for the Web Audio API that supports rhythms, multiple instruments, repeating sections, and complex time signatures.
*   [reverbGen (⭐59)](https://github.com/adelespinasse/reverbGen) - A JavaScript library for generating artificial reverb impulse responses.
*   [TuneJS (⭐175)](https://github.com/abbernie/tune) - A tuning library of microtonal and just intonation scales. Supports over 3,000 historical tunings.
*   [Beet.js (⭐113)](https://github.com/zya/beet.js) - A sequencer library for creating euclidean rhythms and polyrhythms.
*   [AudioKeys (⭐239)](https://github.com/kylestetz/AudioKeys) - A QWERTY keyboard for web audio projects.
*   [web-audio-test-api (⭐67)](https://github.com/mohayonao/web-audio-test-api) - A Web Audio test library for CI.
*   [javascript-karplus-strong (⭐291)](https://github.com/mrahtz/javascript-karplus-strong) - JavaScript/Web Audio implementation of Karplus-Strong guitar synthesis.
*   [osc-msg (⭐17)](https://github.com/mohayonao/osc-msg) - OSC message decoder/encoder with fault tolerance.
*   [Pizzicato (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/alemangui/pizzicato) - A library that aims to simplify the creation and manipulation sounds in the browser.
*   [Mooog (⭐29)](https://github.com/mattlima/mooog) - Tools that simplify working with AudioNodes, inspired by jQuery and mixing tables.
*   [envelope-generator (⭐34)](https://github.com/itsjoesullivan/envelope-generator) - Simple ADSR envelope generator for web audio.
*   [audio contour (⭐20)](https://github.com/danigb/audio-contour) - A 5 stage audio envelope generator.
*   [web-audio-recorder-js (⭐788)](https://github.com/higuma/web-audio-recorder-js) - A library that records audio input (Web Audio API AudioNode object) and encodes to audio file image (Blob object).
*   [audiolet (⭐891)](https://github.com/oampo/Audiolet) - A JavaScript library for real-time audio synthesis and composition from within the browser.
*   [playnote (⭐2)](https://github.com/createbits/playnote) - Play your favorite instrument in the browser, with complex note intervals and scales.
*   [Recorderjs (⭐4.2k)](https://github.com/mattdiamond/Recorderjs) - A plugin for recording/exporting the output of Web Audio API nodes.
*   [resampler (⭐39)](https://github.com/notthetup/resampler) - A utility for resampling audio.
*   [bpm-detective (⭐144)](https://github.com/tornqvist/bpm-detective) – Detects the BPM of a song or audio sample.
*   [web-audio-utils (⭐10)](https://github.com/mohayonao/web-audio-utils) - Commonly needed utility functions for Web Audio API.
*   [web-audio-oscillators (⭐67)](https://github.com/lukehorvat/web-audio-oscillators) - A collection of Web Audio custom oscillators.
*   [midi-ports (⭐15)](https://github.com/AndrejHronco/midi-ports) - handy library to make it easier to work with attached MIDI devices.
*   [Midi Logger](http://outputchannel.com/midi-logger/) - This Midi Logger will print all midi input to your browser for debugging.
*   [Code Player (⭐21)](https://github.com/jcppman/code-player) - An experimental app that makes your codes sing for you.
items.content_html:
Packages / Frameworks

  • Bap (⭐116) - A toolkit for making beats and composing sequences, inspired by the classic MPC60/2000.

Packages / Libraries

  • Sound.js (⭐313) - A micro-library to load, play and generate sound effects and music for games and interactive applications.
  • Circular Audio Wave (⭐270) - A JS library for audio visualization in circular wave using Web Audio API and ECharts.
  • Wad (⭐1.9k) - Web Audio DAW. Use the Web Audio API for dynamic sound synthesis. It's like jQuery for your ears.

Resources / Tutorials

  • WebAudio School (⭐415) - A series of self-guided workshops to learn WebAudio.

Obsolete / Community

  • Gibberish (⭐394) - A JavaScript DSP library that creates JIT optimized audio callbacks using code generation techniques.
  • lissajous (⭐406) - A tool for programmatic audio performance.
  • SSSynthesiser.js (⭐50) - A wavetable synthesizer for interactive music and sound effects.
  • WAAX (⭐303) - Build Music Apps for browsers.
  • Band.js (⭐1.2k) An interface for the Web Audio API that supports rhythms, multiple instruments, repeating sections, and complex time signatures.
  • reverbGen (⭐59) - A JavaScript library for generating artificial reverb impulse responses.
  • TuneJS (⭐175) - A tuning library of microtonal and just intonation scales. Supports over 3,000 historical tunings.
  • Beet.js (⭐113) - A sequencer library for creating euclidean rhythms and polyrhythms.
  • AudioKeys (⭐239) - A QWERTY keyboard for web audio projects.
  • web-audio-test-api (⭐67) - A Web Audio test library for CI.
  • javascript-karplus-strong (⭐291) - JavaScript/Web Audio implementation of Karplus-Strong guitar synthesis.
  • osc-msg (⭐17) - OSC message decoder/encoder with fault tolerance.
  • Pizzicato (⭐1.7k) - A library that aims to simplify the creation and manipulation sounds in the browser.
  • Mooog (⭐29) - Tools that simplify working with AudioNodes, inspired by jQuery and mixing tables.
  • envelope-generator (⭐34) - Simple ADSR envelope generator for web audio.
  • audio contour (⭐20) - A 5 stage audio envelope generator.
  • web-audio-recorder-js (⭐788) - A library that records audio input (Web Audio API AudioNode object) and encodes to audio file image (Blob object).
  • audiolet (⭐891) - A JavaScript library for real-time audio synthesis and composition from within the browser.
  • playnote (⭐2) - Play your favorite instrument in the browser, with complex note intervals and scales.
  • Recorderjs (⭐4.2k) - A plugin for recording/exporting the output of Web Audio API nodes.
  • resampler (⭐39) - A utility for resampling audio.
  • bpm-detective (⭐144) – Detects the BPM of a song or audio sample.
  • web-audio-utils (⭐10) - Commonly needed utility functions for Web Audio API.
  • web-audio-oscillators (⭐67) - A collection of Web Audio custom oscillators.
  • midi-ports (⭐15) - handy library to make it easier to work with attached MIDI devices.
  • Midi Logger - This Midi Logger will print all midi input to your browser for debugging.
  • Code Player (⭐21) - An experimental app that makes your codes sing for you.

items.title: Awesome Webaudio Updates on Feb 24, 2018
items.content_text:
### Packages / Apps

*   [waveform-playlist (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/naomiaro/waveform-playlist) - Multitrack Web Audio editor and player with canvas waveform preview. Set cues, fades and shift multiple tracks in time. Record audio tracks or provide audio annotations. Export your mix to AudioBuffer or WAV! Project inspired by Audacity.
items.content_html:
Packages / Apps

  • waveform-playlist (⭐1.5k) - Multitrack Web Audio editor and player with canvas waveform preview. Set cues, fades and shift multiple tracks in time. Record audio tracks or provide audio annotations. Export your mix to AudioBuffer or WAV! Project inspired by Audacity.

items.content_text:
### Packages / Frameworks

*   [Tone.js (⭐14k)](https://github.com/Tonejs/Tone.js) - A framework for making interactive music in the browser.

### Packages / MIDI

### Packages / Apps

*   [LoopDrop App (⭐827)](https://github.com/mmckegg/loop-drop-app) - MIDI looper, modular synth and sampler app built using Web Audio and Web MIDI APIs.
